title: Overwolf, Bannable or useable?
body: As said in the Title.. Is Overwolf usable or is it a bannable Third Party Program? It has some really interesting features that could help one self get better at the game.. Most notably the death replay and a Replay of the entire game.

replies.body:
Hey there,

To add onto Princess Yaia's comment below, while the application may be considered "safe" and accepted by Riot there's still the chance that in the future there may be reason to ban people for using these tools.

As with any third party application you use it AT YOUR OWN RISK.

>Riot Sargonas has addressed the topic of whether Overwolf applications were acceptable and announced that these applications are acceptable for now. Riot, of course, reserves the right to change their stance on Overwolf; however, if Riot's stance were to change, an announcement would be made and warnings would be given out before any punishments were applied.

>[Come check this master post about 3rd party applications.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/5dmkJinG-3rd-party-applicationsmodifications-whats-allowed-and-what-isnt)
